channel.title: USB extension cable
channel.description:
I need a USB extension cable for a keyboard. Are USB extension cables like HDMI cables, where they're all practically the same? Or are some brands better than others?
I only need 8-10 feet, and don't need a good transfer speed since I would just use it with a keyboard. How does [url=https://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16812816075&cm_re=usb_extention-_-12-816-075-_-Product]this[/url] one look? Is Nippon Labs a good company for cables? This one seems to be a good bang for my buck. Any help would be much appreciated.

item.title: USB extension cable
item.dc:creator: BahamutBBob
item.description:
I forgot about monoprice, thanks for recommending it/reminding me of it.

Read full topic

item.title: USB extension cable
item.dc:creator: Mango_Assassin
item.description:
Yeah generally, usb are fine on long distances with keyboards (not over stepping it obviously) use the site rabid provided.

Read full topic

item.title: USB extension cable
item.dc:creator: RabidMonkey
item.description:
As long as your cables are USB 2 compatible you’re good. Nothing wrong with that one in particular, but you can get extension cables of the same length (or longer) for much cheaper.

Read full topic
